Posts.Content: Absolutely over the moon that test came back with only 12% risk of reoccurance....so chemo not needed . Decided if it was borderline I would err on the side of caution and have chemo but such a clear score . Couldn' be happier. Best news ever
Posts.Title: Oncotype result

Posts.Content: Thank you walkergirl. How did you get on ? Chez xx
Posts.Title: Oncotype result

Posts.Content: Thank you so much for your reply. I have a gp appointment for 11th jan. I cant cope with the periods or the low mood. Its making me crazy so i dont know how my poor partner is coping . Im usually a tough cookie and dealt with my cancer ok but this makes me a blubbering titty baby xx
Posts.Title: Hrt

Posts.Content: Oh Arla thank you that made me laugh.  I hope so too. Just finished a two week agonising period and terrible low mood. Back to normality now for a week or so . My poor partner .....sure he and the dogs keep hiding haha . Thanks again xx
Posts.Title: Hrt

Posts.Content: Hi, had to stop hrt and have coil removed as breast cancer ER positive. Really struggling now without them. HAs anyone else been through this. ? Now back to having long painful periods and really low mood. Have to travel quite far for radiotherapy and not good when i need a bathroom in easy reach
Posts.Title: Hrt
